name: Avoid Functions with High Program Length (PR_LGTH)  (FORTRAN)
description: This calculation is using the results of the calculated Halstead metrics n1, n2, N1 and N2. This diagnostic is a result of this calculation
rationale:
PR_LGTH: Total number of operators and operands used between the component's header and the closing curly bracket.
          PR_LGTH = N1 + N2
The code's textual elements that are considered as operators, operands are respectively indicated by the metrics n1 and n2"
alternativeName: Avoid Functions with High Program Length (PR_LGTH)  (FORTRAN)
